amendment.purpose: An amendment to the McCollum amendment to include the National Institute of Justice as an agency entitled to receive unallocated funds made available in the bill.

action.text: Amendment (A012) offered by Mr. Conyers to the McCollum amendment (A011).
Conyers amendment (A012) modified by unanimous consent. Modification consisted of a technical correction to the title of the specified agency
On agreeing to the Conyers amendment (A012) as modified Agreed to by voice vote.
